bolt.web.coffee.util
Class FileHelper

java.lang.Object
  bolt.web.coffee.util.FileHelper

public class FileHelper
extends Object

This class contains utility methods for working with File objects.

Author:
Matt Bolt

isFileType

public static boolean isFileType(File file,
                                 FileType type)
Determines whether or not the File instance has the file type specified.

Parameters:
file - The File instance to check.
type - The FileType to check the file against.
Returns:
true if the file is of the specified file type.

fileExtensionFor

public static String fileExtensionFor(File file)
This method extracts the file extension, should it exist, and returns the extension String without the "."

Parameters:
file - The File to determine the extension for
Returns:
A String representing the file extension of the File instance.

loadText

public static String loadText(File file)
This method wraps all the horrid Java 6 IO APIs for extracting a String from a text file.

Parameters:
file - The text File to load.
Returns:
A String representation of the contents of the File

collectFiles

public static List<File> collectFiles(List<File> files,
                                      FileType... fileTypes)
See Also:
#collectFiles(java.io.File[], FileType...)}

collectFiles

public static List<File> collectFiles(File[] files,
                                      FileType... fileTypes)
This method recursively collects a list of files from any directories within the List of File instances, while also filtering the files for specific file types.

Parameters:
files - The array of File instances to add to the list.
fileTypes - The FileTypes to look for.
Returns:
A full list of all the File instances.
